faq.title: [Frequently Asked Questions]
faq.subtitle: [Everything you need to know about becoming an agent]

questions.question: [How much does it cost to become an agent?]
questions.answer: [We offer flexible pricing plans starting from $19/month. Choose the plan that best fits your needs.]

questions.question: [Can I change my subscription plan later?]
questions.answer: [Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your subscription plan at any time from your dashboard.]

questions.question: [Do I need to be licensed to join?]
questions.answer: [Yes, you need to have a valid real estate license to become an agent on our platform.]

questions.question: [Is there a free trial available?]
questions.answer: [Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial for all new agents. No credit card required to start.]

questions.question: [What support is available?]
questions.answer: [We provide email support for all plans, with priority support and dedicated account managers for Professional and Premium plans.]

questions.question: [Can I work with an agency?]
questions.answer: [Yes, you can work independently or as part of an agency. You can specify your agency during registration.]

requirements.title: [Requirements]
requirements.subtitle: [What you need to become an agent]

license.title: [Real Estate License]
license.description: [You must have a valid real estate license in your jurisdiction]

experience.title: [Experience]
experience.description: [While not required, some experience in real estate is beneficial]

commitment.title: [Commitment]
commitment.description: [Dedication to providing excellent service to clients]

technology.title: [Technology]
technology.description: [Basic computer skills and access to internet]
